title: FCC Orders Prison Phone Companies to Stop Gouging Inmates and Their Families
text:
FCC Orders Prison Phone Companies to Stop Gouging Inmates and Their Families 
Published By: Gawker.com - Today 
Currently, making a 15-minute phone call from jail might cost you or the person youâ€™re calling as much as $17. Those dollars add up: make ...
